<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.iextdefsym = NumLocalSymbols;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.nextdefsym = NumExtDefSymbols;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.iundefsym = NumLocalSymbols + NumExtDefSymbols;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MLC.dysymtab&#95;command&#95;data.nundefsym =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      O.SymTable.Symbols.size() - (NumLocalSymbols + NumExtDefSymbols);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recomputes and updates offset and size fields in load commands and sections</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since they could be modified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t MachOLayoutBuilder::layoutSegments() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/btf/#ac469d636ea54a1eb9da4c1f633a4496ca4af5f992bdc47a779c499ffc6fdcaf43">HeaderSize</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Is64Bit ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MachO::mach&#95;header&#95;64) : sizeof(MachO::mach&#95;header);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsObjectFile =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      O.Header.FileType == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho/#a4099e754341e36bdbc04624fa2f1e19aa0720b97729bd97889599a4dc76faf0dc">MachO::HeaderFileType::MH&#95;OBJECT</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = IsObjectFile ? (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/btf/#ac469d636ea54a1eb9da4c1f633a4496ca4af5f992bdc47a779c499ffc6fdcaf43">HeaderSize</a> + O.Header.SizeOfCmds) : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are emitting an encryptable binary, our load commands must have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// separate (non-encrypted) page to themselves.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RequiresFirstSectionOutsideFirstPage =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      O.EncryptionInfoCommandIndex.has&#95;value();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadCommand &amp;LC : O.LoadCommands) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    auto &amp;MLC = LC.MachOLoadCommand;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StringRef Segname;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t SegmentVmAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t SegmentVmSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    switch (MLC.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    case MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SegmentVmAddr = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.vmaddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SegmentVmSize = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.vmsize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Segname = StringRef(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.segname,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          strnlen(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.segname,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  sizeof(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.segname)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    case MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT&#95;64:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SegmentVmAddr = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.vmaddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SegmentVmSize = MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.vmsize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Segname = StringRef(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.segname,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          strnlen(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.segname,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  sizeof(MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.segname)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    default:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (Segname == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;LINKEDIT&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We update the &#95;&#95;LINKEDIT segment later (in layoutTail).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;LINKEDIT segment has sections&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LinkEditLoadCommand = &amp;MLC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update file offsets and sizes of sections.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t SegOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t SegFileSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t VMSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Section&gt; &amp;Sec : LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      assert(SegmentVmAddr &lt;= Sec-&gt;Addr &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Section&#39;s address cannot be smaller than Segment&#39;s one&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t SectOffset = Sec-&gt;Addr - SegmentVmAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (IsObjectFile) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (!Sec-&gt;hasValidOffset()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec-&gt;Offset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; else &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">          uint64&#95;t PaddingSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">              offsetToAlignment(SegFileSize, Align(1ull &lt;&lt; Sec-&gt;Align));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec-&gt;Offset = SegOffset + SegFileSize + PaddingSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec-&gt;Size = Sec-&gt;Content.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SegFileSize += PaddingSize + Sec-&gt;Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (!Sec-&gt;hasValidOffset()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec-&gt;Offset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">          if (RequiresFirstSectionOutsideFirstPage) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">            SectOffset = alignToPowerOf2(SectOffset, PageSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">            RequiresFirstSectionOutsideFirstPage = false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec-&gt;Offset = SegOffset + SectOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec-&gt;Size = Sec-&gt;Content.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SegFileSize = std::max(SegFileSize, SectOffset + Sec-&gt;Size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VMSize = std::max(VMSize, SectOffset + Sec-&gt;Size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsObjectFile) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += SegFileSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + SegFileSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SegFileSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(SegFileSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the original vmsize if the segment is &#95;&#95;PAGEZERO.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VMSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Segname == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;PAGEZERO&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ? SegmentVmSize : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(VMSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MLC.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.cmdsize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MachO::segment&#95;command) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MachO::section) &#42; LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.nsects = LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.fileoff = SegOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.vmsize = VMSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;data.filesize = SegFileSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT&#95;64:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.cmdsize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MachO::segment&#95;command&#95;64) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MachO::section&#95;64) &#42; LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.nsects = LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.fileoff = SegOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MLC.segment&#95;command&#95;64&#95;data.vmsize = VMSize;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t MachOLayoutBuilder::layoutRelocations(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadCommand &amp;LC : O.LoadCommands)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Section&gt; &amp;Sec : LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#aa9d03f7cb5acb5efb6c8aaa9fa5df989">Sections</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec-&gt;RelOff = Sec-&gt;Relocations.empty() ? 0 : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec-&gt;NReloc = Sec-&gt;Relocations.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MachO::any&#95;relocation&#95;info) &#42; Sec-&gt;NReloc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> MachOLayoutBuilder::layoutTail(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are building the layout of an executable or dynamic library</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which does not have any segments other than &#95;&#95;LINKEDIT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the Offset can be equal to zero by this time. It happens because of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// convention that in such cases the file offsets specified by LC&#95;SEGMENT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// start with zero (unlike the case of a relocatable object file).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/btf/#ac469d636ea54a1eb9da4c1f633a4496ca4af5f992bdc47a779c499ffc6fdcaf43">HeaderSize</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Is64Bit ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MachO::mach&#95;header&#95;64) : sizeof(MachO::mach&#95;header);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!(O.Header.FileType == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho/#a4099e754341e36bdbc04624fa2f1e19aa0720b97729bd97889599a4dc76faf0dc">MachO::HeaderFileType::MH&#95;OBJECT</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt;= HeaderSize + O.Header.SizeOfCmds) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Incorrect tail offset&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, HeaderSize + O.Header.SizeOfCmds);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The exports trie can be in either LC&#95;DYLD&#95;INFO or in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LC&#95;DYLD&#95;EXPORTS&#95;TRIE, but not both.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DyldExportsTrieSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;LC : O.LoadCommands) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LC.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#a521ae30565359d9c67ad94fed18ce660">MachOLoadCommand</a>.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachO::LC&#95;DYLD&#95;INFO:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t StartOfLinkEdit = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> updateOffset = &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
